title: Bless Up
lyrics: I do what makes me happy
I don't pick up the phone
I know you don't care, but do it make you happy?
I see that you're home, but are you happy?
Soon as I wake up in the morning, I see dollar signs (Dollar-dollar signs)
It's the only thing that's on my mind
Other than pussy, no you can't book me (Yeah-yeah)
All these blue faces on me, I feel like Tookie
I don't even pat no dirty clothes, I leave them where they at (For real)
If I leave the house, I can't say when I'm coming back
Ain't no set amounts, I just walked out and blew some racks
And you can smoke what you want, bro just crashed and [?]
Look at this bitch all over me
Look at my wrist, on froze
Look at my shirt from overseas
That don't make me no hoe, that don't make me more hopeful
Everywhere you go they know you, can't be antisocial
I can't sleep sometimes, I need peace of mind
Plus I only be with dimes
If she with me, she mine
If she with me, she fine
Excuse me if I'm late, I be on CP time (Nigga)
I do what makes me happy
I don't pick up the phone
I know you don't care, but do it make you happy?
I see that you're home, but are you happy?
I do what makes me happy
I don't pick up the phone
I know you don't care, but do it make you happy?
I see that you're home, but are you happy?
